result.title: Is Codeforces running low on budget?
result.content: Last 2 rounds were mirrors (they didn't pay the problem setters). Div.1 rounds have become much less frequent, and so have become Div.2 rounds. I have a friend who had had his round on queue for over 1 year (which means they have a very large number of queued rounds), and still there are no upcoming Codeforces rounds on contests page! Why is that Codeforces? .
